definition: variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The second is that he dare to object to former doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 二是他敢於疑經惑古，駁正舊注多精當。

sentences.english: Do you mean to correct what I say, and treat the words of a despairing man as wind?
sentences.chinese: 絕望人的講論既然如風，你們還想要駁正言語麼。

sentences.english: Do ye imagine to reprove words, and the speeches of one that is desperate, which are as wind?
sentences.chinese: 絕望人的講論既然如風，你們還想要駁正言語嗎。
